article_title: NYPD Nabs Robber with the Help of iPhone 5
article_text:
New York, Oct, 6, 2013: The NYPD were able to nab a 29 years old criminal, named Michael Ingleaisis, who had robbed a girl of her iPhone, while choking her and taking the phone out of her purse. The criminal was caught by using the victim’s Find MY iPhone app to apprehend the robber/ assailant. The crime took place at Corona while the robber/ assailant was caught , with his two buddies from Forest Hills.

Written By: Iftikhar Tariq Khanzada

Gothamist
